The management of the ‘CI-ENERGIES’ responsible for the preparation of the GHG emissions data and the reported GHG emissions reductions on the basis set out within the project final monitoring report Version 1.3 dated 15/02/2024. The calculation and determination of GHG emission reductions from the project is the responsibility of the management of the AERA Group. The development and maintenance of records and reporting procedures are in accordance with the Monitoring Report Version 1.3 dated 15/02/2024.

v vcs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

It is our responsibility to express an independent GHG verification opinion on the GHG emissions and on the calculation of GHG emission reductions from the project for the period 01/07/2022 - 30/06/2023 based on the reported emission reductions in the final monitoring report Version 1.3 dated 15/02/2024 for the same period.

Based on an understanding of the risks associated with reporting GHG emissions data and the controls in place to mitigate these, 4KES planned and performed our work to obtain the information and explanations that we considered necessary to provide sufficient evidence for us to give reasonable assurance that this reported amount of GHG emission reductions for the period is fairly stated.
